title: Quest Items
content:

Used to forge Sussur weapons.

Used to forge Sussur weapons.

Used to forge Sussur weapons.

The wearer of this Item gains:

Disintegrating Night Walkers

The Wearer of this Item gains:

Misty Step: Level 2 Conjuration Spell

Idol of Silvanus

Silvanus' Blessing

Carrying the Idol in the inventory provies the aura to the entire party if they are close enough

The Blade
